synopsis.text: Seven years after losing contact with his childhood friend Atsushi, high school freshman Shoma Mihara receives an unexpected invitation to a mysterious mountain festival. Eager to reconnect, Shoma embarks on a journey to the remote Tanabata Nanayamatsuri, only to find himself lost in a dense forest with no sign of his friend. Upon reaching the picturesque festival site, Shoma encounters a girl named Shiori, who shares his longing to meet someone special. As strange occurrences unfold and the past seems to come alive, the enigmatic event organizer Kanna persuades Shoma to stay and help prepare for the festival. Will Shoma and Shiori unravel the secrets of this mystical gathering and finally reunite with their cherished companions? Join them on a thrilling adventure filled with nostalgia, friendship, and the promise of miracles.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
